name: Oauth-Grails
tagline: Demonstration of OAuth+Grails being used to authenticate with social services
body:
### Third-part services demonstrated:
* Facebook
* Twitter
* LinkedIn

### Installation:
* Clone repo:
`$ https://github.com/zipstacrack/OAuth-Grails.git`
* Configure Grails to match version used in this example - 2.0.3. (That or create your own grails app and copy over relevant source files etc. etc.)
* Set JDK to 1.6 for this example to run (again - it's up to you if you create your own project from this example)
* Navigate to config.groovy and enter in corresponding API-keys and secret-keys.
* Run with `grails run-app` or with IDE of your choice

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.


### Authors and Contributors:
* @zipstacrack - example programmer
* @antony - creator of [OAuth Plugin for Grails](http://grails.org/plugin/oauth)
* @fernandezpablo85 - creator of [Scribe](https://github.com/fernandezpablo85/scribe-java) OAuth Java Libraries

### Support or Contact
Contact @zipstacrack
